name: SPECTRA: Journey To A New Home
name_original: SPECTRA: Journey To A New Home
description:
is a randomly generated text adventure based in a fictional sci-fi universe created by AmalgamAsh.

An unexpected invasion of their home planet forces the alien race known as the Spectra to flee in search of a new place to settle and rebuild. Their escape won't be easy, though, as the ruthless invaders are in hot pursuit of the fleeing refugees!

You are one of these refugees, and it's your job as captain to get your ship and crew somewhere safe. You don't have much of a headstart, so there's no time to waste!

The future of the Spectra is in your hands, Captain Midnight. They're counting on you...
